prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Bass, Guitar, Drums, but without Strings.
captions:
Style 1: This piece of music is composed of Piano, Bass, Guitar, and Drums, but without Strings.

Style 2: This song features Piano, Bass, Guitar, and Drums, but without the addition of Strings.

Style 3: This composition is made up of Piano, Bass, Guitar, and Drums, omitting Strings.
